Fullname_jp: グノーシス ダリア

transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
When Terminal Winter defeats an enemy, reduces the cooldown of Terminal Winter by 2 turns 
+8% Ally Team Critical Damage
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.4_1_jp:
ATK DEF HP +16%
【フィンブルウィンター】で敵を倒した時、
当該スキルのターンを2ターン減少
味方の会心ダメージ+8%
チェーンパッシブのWGダメージ+1
transcend.4_1_kr:
ATK DEF HP +16%
최후의 겨울로 적 처치 시 해당 스킬 쿨타임 -2턴
아군 치명 피해 +8%
체인 패시브의 WG 감소량 +1
transcend.4_1_zh:
ATK DEF HP +16%
使用末日凛冬击杀敌人时,
该技能冷却时间-2回合
友军暴击伤害+8%
连携被动效果的WG降低量+1
transcend.5_1:
ATK DEF HP +22%
Burst Level 3 Unlocked
+50 Action Points at battle start
transcend.5_1_jp:
ATK DEF HP +22%
バーストスキル3段階解禁
戦闘開始時、AP+50
transcend.5_1_kr:
ATK DEF HP +22%
버스트 3단계 해금
입장 시 AP +50
transcend.5_1_zh:
ATK DEF HP +22%
解锁3阶爆发
入场时AP+50
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
Always granted Hubris's Dominion
When defeating an enemy, recovers Health by 10%
transcend.6_jp:
ATK DEF HP +30%
【傲慢の領域】常時付与
敵を倒した時、HP10%回復
transcend.6_kr:
ATK DEF HP +30%
오만의 영역 상시 보유
적 처치 시 체력 10% 회복
transcend.6_zh:
ATK DEF HP +30%
始终附带傲慢领域
击杀敌人时生命值恢复10%

SKT_FIRST.name: Cold-Blooded Torture
SKT_FIRST.name_jp: ルースレストーチャー
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nHas a <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> chance to activate an <color=#28d9ed>enhanced attack</color>. After activating an enhanced attack, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of <color=#28d9ed>all allies</color> by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.\nWhen granted <color=#28d9ed>Hubris's Dominion</color>, doubles activation chance of activating an enhanced attack.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。\n<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>の確率で、<color=#28d9ed>強化攻撃</color>が発生する。強化攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>味方全体</color>の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPさせる。\n<color=#28d9ed>【傲慢の領域】</color>がある場合、強化攻撃の発生率が2倍になる。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다.\n<color=#28d9ed>15%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>강화 공격</color>이 발생합니다. 강화 공격 후에는 <color=#28d9ed>아군 전체</color>의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>가 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 증가합니다.\n<color=#28d9ed>오만의 영역</color> 보유 시 강화 공격의 발동 확률이 2배가 됩니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人。\n<color=#28d9ed>有15%</color>的几率触发<color=#28d9ed>强化攻击</color>。强化攻击后,<color=#28d9ed>全体友军</color>的<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>提升<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>。\n附带<color=#28d9ed>傲慢领域</color>时,强化攻击的触发几率为2倍。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Activates an enhanced attack\nIncreases Penetration by 30%
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 強化攻撃が確定で発動\n貫通力30%UP
SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh: 强化攻击必定触发\n穿透力提升30%

SKT_SECOND.name: Untouchable One
SKT_SECOND.name_jp: アンタッチャブル・ワン
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) When granted <color=#28d9ed>Hubris's Dominion</color>, damage suffered in one attack does not exceed <color=#28d9ed>95%</color> of the caster's Max Health. (Includes Dual Attacks and Additional Attacks)\n(Triggered Effect) Upon taking a critical hit, activates <color=#28d9ed>Cold-Blooded Torture</color> against the target.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (パッシブ効果)<color=#28d9ed>【傲慢の領域】</color>がある場合、一度に受けるダメージが自分の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>95%</color>を超えない。(連携・追加攻撃も含む)\n(発動効果)会心ダメージを受けた場合、対象に<color=#28d9ed>【ルースレストーチャー】</color>を使用する。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (패시브 효과) <color=#28d9ed>오만의 영역</color> 보유 시 한번에 받는 피해는 자신 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>95%</color>를 초과하지 않습니다. (협공 및 추가타 포함)\n(발동 효과) 치명 피격 시 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>냉혹한 고문</color>을 사용합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: (被动效果)附带<color=#28d9ed>傲慢领域</color>效果时,单次所受伤害不会超过自身生命值上限的<color=#28d9ed>95%</color>。(包含夹攻与额外攻击)\n(触发效果)受到暴击时,对目标使用<color=#28d9ed>严刑拷打</color>。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Terminal Winter
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: フィンブルウィンター
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. After attacking, grants <color=#28d9ed>Hubris's Dominion</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与える。攻撃後、自分に<color=#28d9ed>【傲慢の領域】</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격합니다. 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>오만의 영역</color>을 획득합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击全体敌人。攻击后,获得<color=#28d9ed>傲慢领域</color>,\n持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

5: Ignores the Defense of the enemy with the highest Max Health
5_jp: 最大HPが最も高い敵単体の防御力無視
5_kr: 가장 최대 체력이 높은 적의 방어력 무시
5_zh: 无视生命值上限最高敌人的防御力

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers <color=#28d9ed>25</color> Chain Points.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後、CPを<color=#28d9ed>25</color>回復する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>UPさせる。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>25</color>의 CP를 회복합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携收尾效果</color>:攻击后,CP恢复<color=#28d9ed>25</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>提升<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
